title: ACMI in the regions: Stories from Mansfield Shire
subject_group: Anthropology, Ethnology, Exploration & Travel/Victoria - Rural conditions

abstract: Nine stories from the Mansfield region in north-eastern Victoria.
description: 'ACMI in the regions: stories from Mansfield Shire' takes a look at the towns of Mansfield, Tolmie and Jamieson, located in north-eastern Victoria. Interviews with the locals provide a sense of the rich history of these towns and the lifeblood that keeps them thriving.
